location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Blueprint plan based on a provisional survey carried out on 22 July 1934 enclosed to a copy of a ‘Report on areas acquired in Bahrein’ by Major K.M. Papworth (folio 187).Shows the extent of the plot situated about 1 ½ miles south of Manamah on the east coast of Bahrein in the close proximity to the existing RAF Rest House. Dimensions reported.Land characteristics, including information on marking, surface, wells, obstructions, communication and present occupation, described in 'Appendix B’ (folios 190-191).
